name: matrix_cumulative_codeact
requirements: You are a mathematical assistant. Use matrix_add to add matrices and matrix_pad to resize matrices. Each turn builds on the previous result with growing matrix sizes. Output the result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}.

turns.query: Add matrix_5x5_1 and matrix_5x5_2 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
Pad the previous result to 10x10 using matrix_pad, then add matrix_10x10 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
Pad the previous result to 15x15 using matrix_pad, then add matrix_15x15 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
Pad the previous result to 20x20 using matrix_pad, then add matrix_20x20 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
Pad the previous result to 25x25 using matrix_pad, then add matrix_25x25 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
Pad the previous result to 30x30 using matrix_pad, then add matrix_30x30 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
Pad the previous result to 35x35 using matrix_pad, then add matrix_35x35 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
Pad the previous result to 40x40 using matrix_pad, then add matrix_40x40 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
Pad the previous result to 45x45 using matrix_pad, then add matrix_45x45 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
Pad the previous result to 50x50 using matrix_pad, then add matrix_50x50 using matrix_add. Respond with ONLY the complete result as JSON: {{"result": [[...], ...]}}
